title: This Week's Top Stories - Gas Prices Soar, Staples Center Becomes Crypto.com Arena & More
itunes:title: This Week's Top Stories - Gas Prices Soar, Staples Center Becomes Crypto.com Arena & More
description:
Americans struggle with rising gas prices, the politicization of COVID-19 extends to flu shots, and the Staples Center in Los Angeles will be renamed the Crypto.com Arena.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
